short_summary: Automated and Manual Data Capture Solution
description: Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK.  The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

full_summary:
## Automated and Manual Data Capture Solution
### [Eng] Solicitation Number: 2023-45045-210123/B
### [Fra] N° de sollicitation: 2023-45045-210123/B

This is a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of an automated and manual data capture solution (AMDCS) for Statistics Canada to support their survey and Census collection activities.

### Notice Details
* **Date Published:** 2023-02-24
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-27T14:00:00

The selected supplier will be responsible for providing a Commercial Off-the-Shelf (COTS) Solution that meets the requirements outlined in the RFP document. The solution must be capable of handling high volumes of data capture operations and integrate with various existing systems at Statistics Canada.

### Key Features
* Scalability to support multiple operators
* Integration with the Census Response Database (RDB)
* Document prioritization and management
* Hosting on an internal Statistics Canada Protected B cloud environment
* Accessibility in both official languages of Canada (English and French)

The RFP document outlines the specific requirements for this project, including the statement of work and evaluation criteria.

### Important Dates
* Tender closing date: 2023-04-27T14:00:00
* Delivery date: As mentioned in the RFP document

### Contract Details
* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA),** **Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement are applied to this procurement.
